DOC.brief_title: Outcome Assessment Patients Treated With Hyperbaric Oxygen Using OxyVu Tissue Oxygenation Monitoring System
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose clinical study define patient eligibility hyperbaric oxygen therapy ( HBOT ) evaluate wound heal progression HBOT use new hyperspectral imaging technology ( OxyVu ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 18 85 year age Patients wound meet criterion hyperbaric oxygen therapy ( e.g . problem wound , diabetic foot ulcer , necrotizing soft tissue infection ) Compromised Flap Grafts . Exclusion criterion : Patients poor cardiac output ( EF < 20 % ) Patients severe obstructive pulmonary disease n't qualify HBOT Patients untreated asthma n't qualify HBOT Patients utilizing supplemental oxygen ventilator Patients life support medication ( pressor )
